code: import{followfriend}from"../../types";export var followFriendAction=function followFriendAction(){return{type:followfriend};};var followFriendFunction=function followFriendFunction(props){return function(dispatch){var URL="https://motion.propulsion-home.ch/backend/api/social/followers/toggle-follow/"+props.friend.id+"/";var token=props.props.SignInReducer.token;var headers=new Headers({'Content-Type':'application/json','Accept':'application/json','Authorization':"Bearer ".concat(token)});var config={method:'POST',headers:headers,body:{user_id:props.friend.id,username:props.friend.username,things_user_likes:props.friend.things_user_likes}};fetch(URL,config);dispatch(followFriendAction());};};export default followFriendFunction;
